item.title: Reading List - Vim
item.description: Vim Privilege Medium - Why Vim is better than VSCode (About Vim Motion combination of “c,i,d” command and “w,p,”,{") FreeCodeCamp - Why Vim Is More than Just an Editor Vim Motion / Vim Keybindings Vim Salesman - Vim Motions Guide (2022) Vim Configuration ThePrimeagen - 0 to LSP : Neovim RC From Scratch ThePrimeagen - How to Vim in 2023: Tips and Tricks
